description: NativeScript HTML Label Demo for Vue

scripts.run.android.production: devns run android --release --clean --key-store-path ./certs/upload.keystore --key-store-password nativescript --key-store-alias nativescript --key-store-alias-password nativescript
scripts.run.android.timeline: devns run android --config=nativescript.config.timeline.js --release --clean --key-store-path ./certs/upload.keystore --key-store-password nativescript --key-store-alias nativescript --key-store-alias-password nativescript --env.timeline
